description.value:
You create a melody distilled from pure grief, conveying the inevitable loss of everything your target cherishes, audible only to them. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes [[/r 5d6[mental]]] damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 1}, and can't benefit from circumstance or status bonuses for 1 round.

Failure The target takes [[/r 10d6[mental]]] damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 3}, and can't benefit from circumstance or status bonuses for 1 week.

Critical Failure The target takes [[/r 20d6[mental]]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 4}. It can't benefit from circumstance or status bonuses until the curse is broken. While the curse remains, the target's allies are also unable to benefit from circumstance or status bonuses while within 15 feet of it.
